rule.name: One greater than two
rule.guidance: If this happens something is messed up - 1 can't be greater than two!

rule.name: Connect Failure
rule.guidance: PHP could not to the database. Verify your database configuration.

rule.name: Rows skipped (direct query)
rule.guidance: The database server created a result set for a direct query which wasn't processed completely in the client. Often this is a query where the application expects a single row only but the server generates a larger result set. You should check your queries for missing LIMIT clauses or wrong grouping and make sure to process all result sets.

rule.name: Rows skipped (prepared statement)
rule.guidance: The database server created a result set for a prepared statement query which wasn't processed completely in the client. Often this is a query where the application expects a single row only but the server generates a larger result set. You should check your queries for missing LIMIT clauses or wrong grouping and make sure to process all result sets.

rule.name: No index used
rule.guidance: The database server processed queries where no index was used. Verify your tables are being indexed.

rule.name: Bad index used
rule.guidance: The database server processed queries where a bad index was used. Verify your indexes.
